articles.title: New York records 15 cases of rare disease possibly linked to coronavirus in children - SBS News
articles.description: At least 15 children have been hospitalised in New York City with an inflammatory syndrome that could be linked to coronavirus.
articles.content:
Fifteen children have been hospitalised in New York with a rare inflammatory disease possibly linked to coronavirus. 
Kawasaki disease is a mysterious illness that primarily affects children up to the age of five and causes the walls of arteries to become in… [+2167 chars]
